name: SOFA
label: PaO2/FiO2
points_rule: CASE WHEN val>=400 THEN 0 WHEN val<400 AND val>=300 THEN 1 WHEN val<300 AND val>=200 THEN 2 WHEN val<200 AND val>=100 THEN 3 WHEN val<100 THEN 4 END
ref: Merck Manual: SOFA table; Sepsis-3 JAMA 2016

name: SOFA
label: Platelets
points_rule: CASE WHEN val>=150 THEN 0 WHEN val<150 AND val>=100 THEN 1 WHEN val<100 AND val>=50 THEN 2 WHEN val<50 AND val>=20 THEN 3 WHEN val<20 THEN 4 END
ref: Merck Manual: SOFA table; Sepsis-3 JAMA 2016

name: SOFA
label: Total bilirubin
points_rule: CASE WHEN val<1.2 THEN 0 WHEN val>=1.2 AND val<2.0 THEN 1 WHEN val>=2.0 AND val<6.0 THEN 2 WHEN val>=6.0 AND val<12.0 THEN 3 WHEN val>=12.0 THEN 4 END
ref: Merck Manual: SOFA table; Sepsis-3 JAMA 2016

name: SOFA
label: MAP (no vasopressor)
points_rule: CASE WHEN val>=70 THEN 0 WHEN val<70 THEN 1 END
ref: Merck Manual: SOFA cardiovascular component (no vaso)

name: SOFA
label: Vasopressor category
ref: Merck Manual: SOFA cardiovascular component (with vasopressors)

name: SOFA
label: Creatinine
points_rule: CASE WHEN val<1.2 THEN 0 WHEN val>=1.2 AND val<2.0 THEN 1 WHEN val>=2.0 AND val<3.5 THEN 2 WHEN val>=3.5 AND val<5.0 THEN 3 WHEN val>=5.0 THEN 4 END

name: SOFA
label: Glasgow Coma Scale
points_rule: CASE WHEN val=15 THEN 0 WHEN val>=13 AND val<=14 THEN 1 WHEN val>=10 AND val<=12 THEN 2 WHEN val>=6 AND val<=9 THEN 3 WHEN val<6 THEN 4 END

name: qSOFA
label: Respiratory rate
points_rule: CASE WHEN val>=22 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

name: qSOFA
label: Systolic BP
points_rule: CASE WHEN val<=100 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

name: qSOFA
label: GCS
points_rule: CASE WHEN val<15 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
